About This Property
Available 10/1 is this spacious 2 bed 1 bath open layout apartment situated in Brighton with easy access to the i-90,Soldiers Field rd,Harvard,Arsenal Yard,Brighton Landing and so much more! Large living room,fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher. Updated bathroom,hardwood floors throughout,washer/dryer in building,and parking included. First month's rent,one month's security deposit and one month broker fee due at lease signing.
